tipMessages.didYouKnow: Clinet can play your Spotify music!
tipMessages.howTo: Type ``cli$help spotify`` to see how it works. You can also specify a track URL with the ``cli$play`` command.
examples: cli$spotify search Ice Nine Kills A Grave Mistake

tipMessages.didYouKnow: Clinet has support for YouTube videos!
tipMessages.howTo: Type ``cli$help youtube`` to see how it works. You can also query for the first video result or specify a video URL with the ``cli$play`` command.
examples: cli$play Dance Gavin Dance Suspended In This Disaster
cli$youtube search Dance Gavin Dance Suspended In This Disaster

tipMessages.didYouKnow: Clinet can play your tunes from SoundCloud!
tipMessages.howTo: Type ``cli$play {SoundCloud track URL}`` to play a SoundCloud track.

tipMessages.didYouKnow: Clinet can play your music from Bandcamp!
tipMessages.howTo: Type ``cli$play {Bandcamp track/album URL}`` to play either the first song from a Bandcamp album or play a specific Bandcamp track.

tipMessages.didYouKnow: Clinet can fetch info about a Minecraft server or a Minecraft player!
tipMessages.howTo: Type ``cli$help minecraft`` to see how it works.

tipMessages.didYouKnow: Clinet can remind you about something when you need it to!
tipMessages.howTo: Type ``cli$help remind`` to see how it works.
examples: cli$remind Do the dishes in 10 minutes
cli$remind Go trick or treating on October 31st
cli$remind In 8 hours when I wake up from sleep, work on my bot some more

tipMessages.didYouKnow: Clinet can help you settle your bets with friends or foes! ~~And it's totally not rigged, either.~~
tipMessages.howTo: Type ``cli$coinflip`` to flip a coin, ``cli$roll`` to roll a dice, or ``cli$doubleroll`` to roll two die.

tipMessages.didYouKnow: Clinet can fetch information on a specific CVE!
tipMessages.howTo: Type ``cli$cve {CVE ID}`` to fetch information on the specified CVE.

tipMessages.didYouKnow: Clinet can do a geolocation lookup on a specific IP or hostname!
tipMessages.howTo: Type ``cli$geoip {IP/hostname}`` to fetch geoIP information on the specified IP/hostname.

tipMessages.didYouKnow: Clinet can fetch information on a GitHub user or repository!
tipMessages.howTo: Type ``cli$github {username(/repo)} to fetch information on the specified username or repository.

tipMessages.didYouKnow: Clinet can apply a wide variety of effects on an image!
tipMessages.howTo: Type ``cli$help image`` to see how it works. You can either attach an image to apply the effects to or attach nothing to apply the effects to the last image in the past 100 chat messages.

tipMessages.didYouKnow: Clinet can try to understand the type of each word you pass it!
tipMessages.howTo: Type ``cli$nlp {message}`` to parse the given message.
examples: cli$nlp According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly.

tipMessages.didYouKnow: Clinet can pin star-reacted messages (or any messages reacted to with a specified emoji) to a starboard channel!
tipMessages.howTo: As a regular user, just star a message and watch it show up on the starboard! As a server administrator, type ``cli$help starboard`` to see how to configure the starboard.

tipMessages.didYouKnow: Clinet can define a word according to the Urban Dictionary!
Clinet can get information on a user who's either in the server via a mention or who's not in the server via a user ID!
tipMessages.howTo: Type ``cli$userinfo {mention/user ID}`` to get the specified user's information!

tipMessages.didYouKnow: Clinet can get your favorite xkcd comics!
tipMessages.howTo: Type ``cli$help xkcd`` to see how it works.

responseEmbed.title: Do you plan world domination?
responseEmbed.description: It's what we do every night, Pinky.
